text: Valentin Miculescu (born 4 September 1975) is a Romanian former footballer who last played for FCM Reșița in the Romanian Liga II. ==Club career== Miculescu had a spell in Hungary where he played for Békéscsaba Előre. ==Personal life== Valentin's son, David Miculescu, is also a footballer.Coronavirusul loveste la UTA! Un jucator a avut febra si testul a confirmat infectarea. Amicalul de lux cu CFR Cluj e ca si picat. orange.ro ==References== ==External links== * Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Romanian footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Liga II players Category:FC Politehnica Timișoara players Category:FC UTA Arad players Category:FC Bihor Oradea players Category:Nemzeti Bajnokság I players Category:Békéscsaba 1912 Előre footballers Category:Romanian expatriate footballers Category:Romanian expatriate sportspeople in Hungary Category:Expatriate footballers in Hungary
title: Valentin Miculescu
